mapper.select: SELECT POST_NO, POST_FAVORITE, POST_TITLE, POST_CATEGORY, POST_DATE, SCARY_NUMBER, COMMENTS_NUMBER FROM TBL_POST WHERE POST_WRITER = #{userNo} ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_POST WHERE POST_WRITER = #{userNo}
SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE, LIKE_NUMBER FROM TBL_COMMENT WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY COMMENT_DATE DESC, COMMENT_NO DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_COMMENT WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT POST_NO, POST_FAVORITE, POST_TITLE, POST_CATEGORY, POST_DATE, SCARY_NUMBER, COMMENTS_NUMBER FROM TBL_POST WHERE POST_WRITER = #{userNo} AND POST_FAVORITE = true ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_POST WHERE POST_WRITER = #{userNo} AND POST_FAVORITE = true
SELECT USER_NAME, USER_ID, EMAIL FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_NO= #{userNo}
SELECT m.MBTI_TYPE, i.MBTI_INFO FROM TBL_MBTI m JOIN TBL_MBTI_INFO i ON m.MBTI_TYPE = i.MBTI_TYPE WHERE m.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CHECK (USER_NO, CHECK_DATE, CHECK_STATUS) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{today}, TRUE)
mapper.select: SELECT CHECK_DATE FROM TBL_CHECK WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CHECK_STATUS = TRUE ORDER BY CHECK_DATE
SELECT LEVEL FROM TBL_LEVEL WHERE LEVEL_NO = (SELECT LEVEL_NO + 1 FROM TBL_LEVEL WHERE LEVEL_NO = #{currentLevelNo})

SELECT U.USER_NO AS userNo, U.USER_NAME as userName, U.EMAIL, U.USER_ID, U.USER_IMAGE AS profileImage, L.LEVEL AS level FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_LEVEL L ON U.LEVEL_NO = L.LEVEL_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT L.LEVEL U.USER_NAME FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_LEVEL L ON U.LEVEL_NO = L.LEVEL_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo}
